_header: For there were they bal[?] burned
_description: English abuse against the Scots after Dunbar in one MS of Peter Langtoft’s Chronicle — nine lines

CULGg11.First Lines:
For þare wer þai bal brendhe kauged ham þidre
                    kendAnd dreued to dote…
CULGg11.Last Lines: …Hurled out of herrefro coylthe ne cotte
